example.text: Over the past few weeks, Republicans in Congress have been negotiating a budget proposal that threatens to default on our loans for the first time in history. This would devastate our economy and the people of Sacramento County who rely on essential services like SNAP and veteran care.

Today, we have a chance as the United States Congress to take a big vote, Democrats and Republicans, to say: Let's try to figure out what happened. It affected all of us, and we ought to do everything we can as the United States Congress, Democrats and Republicans, and as a global scientific community to prevent this from happening again in our lifetime and, hopefully, ever again.

Great news! $5.7 million in funding is coming to #CA06 to support 350+ [[user]] members. These dedicated individuals play a vital role in building a better future for all. As a proud supporter of AmeriCorps, I’m excited to see the impact of this funding on our community.

As a physician, I believe personal health decisions should be made by patients and their doctors. That's why I united my fellow physicians in Congress and OB-GYNs to denounce gov't intrusion in the exam room, which harms the patient-physician relationship and health outcomes. [[url]]

I join [[user]] in calling on the [[user]] to invite Taiwan to participate as an observer in the World Health Assembly. Taiwan has been a crucial ally in the fight against infectious diseases, and they should not be blocked from sharing their expertise w/ the world. #LetTaiwanHelp [[url]]

My office has heard from thousands of constituents, returned over $4 million to local taxpayers, secured funding for local community projects, and passed legislation to lower costs for American families. Wishing you and your family a Happy New Year.
